name: Nemesis
overview: Nemesis for the Sega Master System is an MSX port, which was converted without a license and released in South Korea by Zemina in 1987. This version of the game is identical to the MSX version, running in the graphics mode intended for SG-1000 backwards compatibility. As a result the gameplay is significantly more choppy than its arcade counterpart, and the graphics do not take advantage of the Master System hardware.
